title: Patch Notes
content: st. Validation Errors should no longer disappear when switching between tabs inside the Project Settings window. Fixed TextureResources not importing correctly. Fixed inability to change a project back to its original name. Fixed an Exception Error due to the Dependency list not updating after renaming a project in that list. Fixed the horizontal scroll bar not adjusting to text width in the Story Editor. Fix a validation error when trying to restore previous mod name if the mod hasn't been save
